title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ion asked about the scars Cazador left on his back. Raphael seemed interested - he said he'd think about Astarion's request and see us again soon.

Continuing down the path of your main quests such as Infiltrate Moonrise Towers will eventually lead you to the Shadow Cursed Lands. This is where you will run into Raphael again just outside Grand Mausoleum (Thorm Mausoleum). Bring Astarion with you to learn more info from the devil and to ensure your new journals are recorded for your companion que
